verses.verse: Περὶ <WG4012> Peri about ( Food Sacrificed to Idols) δὲ <WG1161> de Now τῶν <WG3588> tōn [food] εἰδωλοθύτων <WG1494> eidōlothytōn sacrificed to idols : οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen We know ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that πάντες <WG3956> pantes vvv γνῶσιν <WG1108> gnōsin knowledge . ἔχομεν <WG2192> echomen we all have ἡ <WG3588> hē - γνῶσις <WG1108> gnōsis Knowledge φυσιοῖ <WG5448> physioi puffs up , ἡ <WG3588> hē - δὲ <WG1161> de but ἀγάπη <WG26> agapē love οἰκοδομεῖ <WG3618> oikodomei builds up .

καὶ <WG2532> kai even γὰρ <WG1063> gar For εἴπερ <WG1512> eiper if εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin there are λεγόμενοι <WG3004> legomenoi so-called θεοὶ <WG2316> theoi gods , εἴτε <WG1535> eite whether ἐν <WG1722> en in οὐρανῷ <WG3772> ouranō heaven εἴτε <WG1535> eite or ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on γῆς <WG1093> gēs earth ὥσπερ <WG5618> hōsper (as εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin there are θεοὶ <WG2316> theoi gods πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi many [ so-called ] καὶ <WG2532> kai and κύριοι <WG2962> kyrioi lords ), πολλοί <WG4183> polloi -

ἀπόλλυται <WG622> apollytai is destroyed γὰρ <WG1063> gar [So] ὁ <WG3588> ho [this] ἀσθενῶν <WG770> asthenōn weak ἐν <WG1722> en by τῇ <WG3588> tē - σῇ <WG4674> sē your γνώσει <WG1108> gnōsei knowledge . ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἀδελφὸς <WG80> adelphos brother , δι’ <WG1223> di’ for ὃν <WG3739> hon whom Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ ἀπέθανεν <WG599> apethanen died ,
